page.title: 02Housing
page.content: The majority of houses in Forteviot are owned by the Laird,who either rents them out or gives free lets to his estate workers.The Laird's son owns and lets outs Broombarns and Forteviot Farm to his farm manager who also looks after Kildinny Farm. Houses other than these mentioned are privately owned.These include Greylag House,the former Manse,Hennhill Farm,Broomhill and the former School house. Property other than houses and farms includes a Smithy, an organ builder's, a sawmill, a Village Hall, a Hotel, a church and a school. Apart from the former Manse the dwelling houses in the centre of Forteviot form a terraced courtyard on the north side of the B935 and the workshops are all on the south side, along with the hall and church.
